author: Reuters Editorial
title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to April 30
text:
Feb 23 (Reuters) -
For other diaries, please see:
Top Economic Events
Emerging Markets Economic Events
Government Debt Auctions
Political and General News
U.S. Federal Reserve
Today in Washington
This Diary is filed daily. ** Indicates new events
FRIDAY, FEBRUARY 23 SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia Payments System Board Meeting.
TUESDAY, FEBRUARY 27 YEREVAN, Armenia - Armenia central bank to publish its inflation report SEOUL - Bank of Korea monetary policy meeting.
BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank rate-setting meeting - 1300 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, FEBRUARY 28 SINGAPORE - 24th ASEAN Economic Ministers’ Retreat (AEM-R) and 16th AEMEU Trade Commissioner Consultations (to Mar. 2).
THURSDAY, MARCH 1 SAO PAULO - Federal Reserve Bank of New York President William Dudley speaks on trade and globalization before an event organized by the Central Bank of Brazil - 1600 GMT. CHISINAU - National Bank of Moldova interest rate decision.
KIEV - National Bank of Ukraine monetary policy meeting.
FRIDAY, MARCH 2 ** PRAGUE - European Central Bank Executive Board member Yves Mersch speaks at the KPMG Finance Forum 2018 - 0800 GMT.
TUESDAY, MARCH 6 MANILA – Philippines’ central bank Governor Nestor Espenilla participating at the Management Association of the Philippines’ economic briefing – 0330 GMT. SYDNEY - Speech by Philip Lowe, RBA Governor, at the AFR Business Summit, Sydney – 2140 GMT. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland monetary policy council meeting (to March 7). SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia interest rate meeting – 0330 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, MARCH 7 ANKARA - Central Bank of Turkey holds monetary policy meeting. TBILISI - National Bank of Georgia monetary policy committee meeting. KUALA LUMPUR - Central Bank of Malaysia interest rate decision.
THURSDAY, MARCH 8 LIMA – Central bank of Peru interest rate decision. BELGRADE - National Bank of Serbia interest rate decision.
MONDAY, MARCH 12 SYDNEY - Speech by Michele Bullock, RBA Assistant Governor (Financial System), at the Seamless Australia Payments Conference – 2340 GMT.
TUESDAY, MARCH 13 SYDNEY - Speech by Christopher Kent, RBA Assistant Governor (Financial Markets), at the KangaNews DCM Summit – 2205 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, MARCH 14 ANKARA - Central Bank of the Republic of Turkey releases the minutes of its March monetary policy committee meeting. ZAGREB - Croatia National Bank monetary policy meeting. BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank to publish the minutes of its February 2018 rate-setting meeting – 1300 GMT.
THURSDAY, MARCH 15 SWITZERLAND - Swiss National Bank (SNB) to assess monetary policy – 0830GMT. SYDNEY - Speech by Guy Debelle, RBA Deputy Governor, at the Financial Risk Day - 2245 GMT.
MONDAY, MARCH 19 SANTIAGO - Central Bank of Chile monetary policy meeting (to March 20). ABUJA - Central Bank of Nigeria monetary policy meeting (to March 20).
TUESDAY, MARCH 20 SYDNEY - Panel participation by Michele Bullock, Assistant Governor (Financial System), at the ASIC Annual Forum 2018, Sydney – 0415 GMT. BRASILIA- Central Bank of Brazil monetary policy committee meeting (to March 21). SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) will release the minutes of March monetary policy meeting – 0030 GMT. RABAT - Bank of Morocco monetary policy meeting.
WEDNESDAY, MARCH 21 JAKARTA - Indonesia Central Bank board of governors meeting. (to March 22).
THURSDAY, MARCH 22 MANILA - Philippines Central Bank monetary policy meeting.
FRIDAY, MARCH 23 MOSCOW - Central Bank of Russia interest rate decision - 1030 GMT.
MONDAY, MARCH 26 CAPE TOWN - South Africa Reserve Bank starts its three-day monetary policy committee meeting (to March 28).
TUESDAY, MARCH 27 SYDNEY - Speech by Christopher Kent, RBA Assistant Governor (Financial Markets), at the Investment Implementation Summit – 0045 GMT. BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank rate-setting meeting - 1200 GMT. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland monetary policy meeting. No Interest rate announcement is expected.
WEDNESDAY, MARCH 28 BANGKOK - Bank of Thailand monetary policy committee meeting.
THURSDAY, MARCH 29 SUVA - Reserve Bank of Fiji holds board meetings to announce interest rates. CAIRO - Central Bank of Egypt monetary policy committee meeting. PRAGUE - Czech National Bank monetary policy meeting.
WEDNESDAY, ARPIL 4 ** COLOMBO - Central Bank of Sri Lanka monetary policy report.
FRIDAY, APRIL 6 PRAGUE - Czech National Bank will release the minutes of its March 2018 Monetary Policy Meeting.
WEDNESDAY, APRIL 11 BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank to publish the minutes of its March 2018 rate-setting meeting – 1200 GMT. ZAGREB - Croatia National Bank monetary policy meeting.
THURSDAY, APRIL 12 BELGRADE - National Bank of Serbia interest rate decision. MEXICO CITY - Central Bank of Mexico publishes monetary policy statement.
FRIDAY, APRIL 13 KIEV - National Bank of Ukraine holds monetary policy meeting.
TUESDAY, APRIL 24 BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank holds its rate-setting meeting - 1200 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, APRIL 25 ANKARA - Central Bank of Turkey holds monetary policy meeting.
THURSDAY, APRIL 26 MEXICO CITY - Mexico Central Bank issues the minutes of its monetary policy meeting.
MONDAY, APRIL 30 ANKARA - Central Bank of Turkey releases minutes of its April monetary policy committee meeting.
